mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments(instruction_id, payer_account, payee_account, currency, amount, purpose, channel, batch_id, priority, risk_score, status, created_at) VALUES(#{instructionId}, #{payerAccount}, #{payeeAccount}, #{currency}, #{amount}, #{purpose}, #{channel}, #{batchId}, #{priority}, #{riskScore}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT instruction_id, payer_account, payee_account, currency, amount, purpose, channel, batch_id, priority, risk_score, status, created_at FROM payments ORDER BY created_at DESC
